titles.title: Keeping the Promise to American Public Servants Act of 2018
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the deduction of moving expenses of Federal employees.
Keeping the Promise to American Public Servants Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Keeping the Promise to American Public Servants Act of 2018
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow federal employees to deduct certain moving expenses that are reimbursed or furnished in kind to an individual.
